GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.17.2
GSD.description:
XArray: Fix xas_create_range() when multi-order entry present

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 18f13edf3424b3b61814b69d5269b2e14584800c, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 6b24ca4a1a8d4ee3221d6d44ddbb99f542e4bda3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: XArray: Fix xas_create_range() when multi-order entry present
